content: this legal document discusses the division of property between two individuals referred to as mr mm and mr cg the property in question is located in municipality osimo and consists of multiple apartments and garages the document provides detailed information about each property unit including the number of rooms surface area and cadastral income it also mentions the cadastral data and boundaries of each unit mr mm and mr cg have decided to end their joint ownership and divide the property into two shares each share is allocated to one of the individuals and includes specific real estate units the document states the value of each share and mentions that the amount is due it is signed by a notary and witnessed by the parties involved
